title: The Black Box
description: A coroner arrives at the scene of a car wreck to find a woman dead. He becomes suspicious when he notices unusual markings on her face. Was her death really an accident? Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on March 13, 2020.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
